about: Our beautiful, private, seaside resort accommodation is tucked away in a secluded corner of Mac Payong, just 30 meters from the 2km White Beach. Just a short drive away from Moalboal and Panagsama, it offers a quiet, idyllic setting for your holiday. The location couldn't get any better for diving as one of the best reefs in the area is directly in front of your ocean view room. The reef is perfect for beginner divers, and also for snorkelers. However the step walls make an exhilarating dive for seasoned advanced divers. The resort's architecture is a blend of Mediterranean and native styles incorporating local stone and thatched roof with white arches and Spanish tiles. Each room has either a large arched doorway or huge glass sliding doors to provide guests with amazing ocean views. Fall asleep after a hard day's dive to the sound of gentle waves and the wind gently blowing through the yucca trees. Breathtaking frescos by painter Alfred Galvez and portraits of well-spent travels adorn its Mediterranean-inspired hallways. Situated conveniently in one of Cebu's bustling business districts, the hotel is just a 2-minute walk to Metro Gaisano and Ayala malls, affording guests easy access to leisure activities, such as shopping and sightseeing.A riot of flavors awaits you at the Flora Cafe, where international cuisine is served in the most inventive and appetizing of ways. Enjoy great music and relax at the Piano Bar while sipping on your favorite wines and cocktails. Pamper yourself with our massage service or work up a good sweat at our Fitness Center. Celebrate momentous occasions and attend seminars and conferences in style and luxurious comfort, in our various function rooms and ballroom. You will fall in love with Hotel Elizabeth. It’s an experience on its own.

name: Tepanee Beach Resort
about: Close your eyes and imagine the ocean, blue, clear and uncontaminated, then think of a white beach where you can relax during the day and from which to observe a sky so rich in warm shades at sunset to leave you speechless … now open your eyes and come to experience this and more at the Tepanee Beach Resort. Malapascua is the beautiful little island of the Philippines that hosts Tepanee: an intimate and welcoming resort where you will have the opportunity to spend an unforgettable holiday of relaxation and diving, enriched by a tasty food and wine proposal, suitable for a varied international clientele. Link together the idea of your holiday with a truly unique welcome, staying in cottages overlooking the ocean.Rooms and cottages, built in perfect harmony between functionality and respect for the environment, overlooking the Pacific Ocean or on lush gardens adorned with frangipani, the fragrant flower that gave our name to this corner of paradise. It's holiday time: we wait for you! Malapascua is the beautiful small island of the Philippines hosting Tepanee: an intimate and friendly resort that will give you an unforgettable holiday. Tepanee stands on a small hill that rises up from Logon beach and our territory goes down to our own private sandy beach, an area isolated from the rest of the island from where it’s possible to admire breathtaking sunsets in an area secluded from the rest of the island and where we placed beach umbrellas, sunbeds, a gazebo for massages and our lovely Chiringuito beach bar. In addition, in the hill adjacent to the reception is our panoramic Amihan restaurant. The name TEPANEE comes from the name of the Polynesian frangipani plant, a tropical tree that graces our gardens with fragrant flowers of various colors. Historically, the concept for our resort followed a philosophy of low environment impact. Most of the building materials are natural and local: wood, bamboo and stones used for the main structures, roofs made of a typical straw named kogon. The buildings are almost invisible from the ocean, even if many are built right on the seaside. Opened on December 8, 2008, Tepanee in the beginning was consisted of 6 independent double cottages and one building of two storeyes with 4 triple rooms. We have grown, and can now offer you: Deluxe cottages: independent buildings with a superb ocean view, the best in Malapascua Island, facing the sundown. They feature: aircon, ceiling fan, en-suite bathroom, hot shower, minibar, safety box, balcony with sofa, queen size double bed with option for one or two extra single beds, bamboo and wooden furniture, wooden floor, entrance door and windows with mosquito screen and blackout curtains, free wifi, daily cleaning service. These cottages can accommodate up to four people. Superior cottages: independent buildings with aircon, ceiling fan, en-suite bathroom, hot shower, minibar, safety box, balcony with sofa, queen size double bed with option for one extra single bed, bamboo and wooden furniture, wood floor, windows with mosquito screen and blackout curtains, free wifi, daily cleaning service. Some cottages can accommodate an extra single bed for a fourth person. Some cottages have the ocean view, some have a partial ocean view, some have the garden view. Standard rooms: together in two different buildings of two storeys. All the rooms have a double queen sized bed and a single bed, a have private entrance, aircon, ceiling fan, en-suite bathroom, hot shower, minibar, safety box, balcony with sofa, bamboo and wooden furniture, wooden floor, windows with mosquito screen and blackout curtains, free wifi, daily cleaning service. Some rooms can accommodate an extra single bed for a fourth person. The Standard rooms have partial ocean view or garden view. Evoking an island feel, the resort boast of cozy and excellently constructed rooms that also utilizes natural materials such as bamboo among others. The rooms are decorated with colourful walls and unique bamboo beds, offering both air-conditioning and a ceiling fan with a year round availability of fresh ocean breeze that can be enjoyed from our spacious balconies. It is also furnished with a mini bar, a safe for your valuables and wifi connectivity throughout the property. One thing you won't find in our rooms though, is the television as we feel that this distract guests from all the natural beauty this island has to offer. We provide for the wifi in all the resort. Please, note that we are in a remote island and the service sometime may be slow or discontinuous. Since December 2012, you can eat and drink right next to our private beach, at the Chiringuito beach bar, where we serve breakfast and lunch, snacks, drinks and natural fruit juices, cocktails, with soft music in the background. In May 2013, we opened our new Amihan restaurant, in a panoramic position on the hill at the new entrance of Tepanee. We are serving the amazing Italian cuisine that Amihan had already become renowned for: pizza, vegetables, fish and grilled meats, pasta and pastries, tropical fruit, wine and much more. Tepanee Beach Resort is located in a non-flat area: from the reception to the rooms and the beach on the back there are stairs to go up and down. The steps are wide and low, but they do exist: please be aware of this when choosing our hotel for your stay. We do not provide hair-dryers and television. We provide beach towels upon request and with payment of the laundry service. We accept credit cards payments: Visa, Mastercard, American Express and JCB (bank transaction charges apply). We also accept cash payments in Pesos, Euros and US Dollars. Check-in is possible from 3:00 PM to 11:00 PM. Check-out must be completed by 12:00 noon. Reception is open from 6:00 AM to 11:00 PM. During your stay you will have direct assistance with everything concerning scuba dives and diving courses, which can be easily booked through us. Please contact our reception for all the informations and to book the dives. Tepanee organizes transfers from and to Cebu City/Airport/Pier at any time by private van and boat: our boats arrive and depart from our private beach, located inside the Tepanee Beach Resort area. There are 144 kms of paved road from Cebu City to Maya, the port where to take the boat for Malapascua; then there are 8 kms by sea from Maya to Tepanee Beach Resort. The road ride takes about 3 hours, while the boat ride only 30 minutes. About pick up transfers, please note that the last boat departure allowed by the Government from Maya to Malapascua is 6:00PM, so consider to overnight in Cebu City if the flight is landing after 2:00PM. About back transfers, the earliest departure from Malapascua is 6:00AM and we have to schedule the departure from Malapascua at least 7 hours in advance if the for an international flight and 6 hours in advance for a domestic flight. Depending on the schedule of the flight, please consider to overnight in Cebu City the night before the flight: for example, if the flight is an international departure at 12:45, it's necessary to leave Malapascua at 5:00AM but this is not allowed by the Government, so it will be needed to leave Malapascua the day before (or choose a later flight, of course). Just contact our reception, please, for all the informations and to book the transfer. Our staff are delighted to respond to your requests, and we are certain that you will have all you need for relaxing and memorable holiday.
address: Logon Daanbantayan, 6013 Philippines

name: Fantasy Lodge
about: Eco friendly resort Fantasy Lodge is a special place for those looking for a different experience. ''Scientists say that time spent in nature can make us happier and kinder, which sounds exactly how I want my kids to be during a family vacation. If you're hoping for some time to reconnect with loved ones and Mother Nature, book a flight or take a drive to this naturally beautiful destination and forget even at one time the hustle and bustle of city life '' Besides the attraction of the mountains and thick jungle views, it has such old fashioned and charming features with traditional looking residence and an admirable tropical garden. In the past many foreign and local travelers have visited this place and now it is completely open for the Nature lovers... This is more a "garden hotel" with a comfortable and stylish interior. To maintain the romance, peace and privacy there are only 5 rooms and our additional suit Geodesic DOME . Here, guests can retire to the peace and seclusion of their own world with a cool and refreshing swimming pool and the view from the terrace is overlooking the sea, with fresh breeze from the mountains and panoramic view of Negros island.... This lovely property surrounded by orchards, plantations and well-tended gardens, allow you to spend evenings strolling, listening to birdsongs or lazing on dim light verandas. This is even more useful as a holiday home for Inland residents needing a change and for tourists Who do not disrupt the village life or the environment. The friendly and courteous staff from the Manager right down to the room boy has been the key success factor of this beautiful holiday lodge. This is certainly the perfect place for a quiet and relaxing holiday in a homely ambience for both foreign tourists and the locals. The wide variety of Tropical Plants and Flowers that the beautiful garden offers creates the perfect atmosphere for Meditation and Yoga. The spacious open restaurant creates the best environment for you to mix with other travelers and step into a friendly discussion while sipping a glass of Wine or hot Coffee.

name: Copenhagen Residences
about: When you're in Cebu, it's best to be in the middle of everything. At Copenhagen Residences, that's just where you'll be. Right along A.C. Cortes Avenue in Mandaue City, Copenhagen Residences offers 98 well-appointed guestrooms for the discerning and wise traveler. From this location, you can reach Mactan Island where the international airport and world-class resorts are in less than 15 minutes and in just 20 minutes, Cebu's central business district. Each room at the Copenhagen offers all the conveniences of home with hotel-style service. Choose a studio apartment if you're flying solo or with a pal, or book our stylish loft if you're traveling with the entire family. If you are traveling on a budget, we are offering an alternative at the nearby Copenhagen East along the same road. The studio units also come with essential amenities. About half a kilometer away from the Copenhagen Main Residences, the Copenhagen East is an extension of the main building meant for the cost-conscious traveler. ROOMS At competitive rates, guests will enjoy all the essential amenities including cable television and WiFi service at our studio or multi-room residential units, all furnished in a modern and sleek style. RESTAURANT If you need a quick bite to eat or want to spend the night enjoying a special dinner, head up to Chips Café at the seventh floor of the Copenhagen Main and sample the sumptuous fare. Have a drink at the rooftop lounge with views of the north and south sides of the metropolis. Chips Café provides a relaxing atmosphere if you want to unwind. FUNCTION ROOM Hosting your next business meeting or conference need not be a hassle. We have a fully-air conditioned function room equipped with highly-reliable sound system to make sure you get your message across. Throw a party and have a great time with family and friends as you celebrate life's important milestones. 24/7 SECURITY Your safety is our priority. The Copenhagen Residences is equipped with strategically-placed CCTV cameras and employs dependable security personnel to make sure you are safe and sound for the duration of your stay. Whether you're in Cebu for business or pleasure, the Copenhagen Residences is the total place to come home to after a long day. Copenhagen Residences is owned and operated by Iron Wood Property Ventures Corp.
address: A.C.Cortes Ave, Mandaue 6014 Philippines

Malapascua Island is becoming known as one of the best places for Tresher Sharks diving, but we have more than just tresher sharks. Our resort is built on 15 meters out over to the beach and our dive boats, making diving access easy. The views in our restaurant during sunrise and sunset is spectacular and our hotel rooms are simply amazing. The houses have high standard and a very nice garden with possibilities for several different activities like swimming in the swimming pool, mini golf, billiard, volleyball and relaxation beside the swimming pool or in one of the beach houses to mention a few. The houses have very nice terraces with sea view. The daily life on Olango Island has not changed significantly the last few generations, so tourists will have an exotic backpacker experience visiting the island.

name: Malapascua Legend
about: Malapascua Island is situated two and a half hours away by car and four hours away by bus from the city of Cebu. A barangay of the town of Daanbantayan, Malapascua Island takes pride in its world class diving spots and pristine white sand beaches. It is widely referred by locals as the "Boracay of Cebu." As a diving destination, Malapascua Island has become known for its beautiful coral gardens and excellent local dive spots, as well as further out sites like Gato Island, Monad Shoal, and Kemod Shoal. Monad Shoal is an underwater plateau where thresher sharks and manta rays can be seen on a regular basis. The town's name is derived from two Spanish words, "mal" and "pascua", which translated in English means, "bad" and "Easter" or bad Christmas. According to locals, the Spaniards named the island that way after they arrived there on a stormy Christmas. Malapascua Island is a promise of a great dive and a relaxing beach experience, making it a popular travel destination for local and foreign tourists alike.
address: Bounty Beach Daan Bantayan Philippines

name: Sea Turtle House Moalboal
about: The Sea Turtle House Beach Resort is a resort for nature lovers and its rooms are located around 9 meters over sea level and is therefore very safe from tsunamis. It has stairs and handrail for to go down to the sea. It has a self made sand beach with beach volley ball, badminton and other games for our in house guest's free use. It has a great view to the clear blue sea. The difference between high and low tide here can vary vertically more than 3 meters depending on the position of the moon. The sea here has some very unique little animals because it has been reported that it was closed on its sides naturally many, many years ago. That's why some scientists are planning to study the phenomenon under sea level. From our sea shore of limestone with corals and sandy areas you can often observe sea turtles, especially when they swim up for air. The resort offers fresh air and tranquility for a great night sleep. Experience snorkeling, scuba diving or free diving. Just a short walk away you find also the well known White Beach. The resort has a size of around 5000 square meters (one of the largest resorts here) - that offers a lot of space, garden and possibilities for just 7 guestrooms and the resort practically has no neighbors - and most rooms have even built in noise reducers. These are great advantages in a lively country like that. The manager/co-owner of the resort loves the place so much he would never want to stay anywhere else.
address: 130 Looc Saavedra, Moalboal 6032 Philippines

name: Verbena Hotel
about: Verbena Pension House soon to be transformed into Verbena Hotel to continue bringing you the comforts of a home. Verbena's drive towards uncompromising excellence in customer service and accommodation springs from a history that had become pivotal to this customer-focused business. Verbena had its humble beginning on May 3, 1976 as a small makeshift eatery. "Cozy Nook" was located in the garage of Engr. Pedro Urgello's duplex residence along "Verbena Street," hence its name today. It served mainly taxi drivers trying to get hearty comfort food to get them through their daily grind. The dishes fish head tinola and caldereta were among the top sellers that drew attention to its customers. Eventually, the reputation of good and affordable food reached office workers of establishments within its vicinity who later made the place their regular eating place. Its popularity grew to gain the moniker "Back Han Palace" since it was located behind the former Great Han Palace restaurant. The proprietor, Justina T. Urgello, an insightful businesswoman and wife of Engr. Pedro Urgello, shelled out a meager amount about P 1,170 as capital for her small eatery which paid off when business boomed even more. Ten years later, in 1986, Mrs. Justina Urgello loaned P 150,000 from the bank for the construction of a 3-storey lodging house. This came about after her desire to open a safe, clean and affordable boarding/lodging house for medical students of the neighboring medical school. Mission: We commit to continuously offer excellent, convenient accommodation as well as quality and decent customer services to our valued guests. Vision To be recognized as best Pension House in Queen City of the South-Cebu.
address: 584-A Don Gil Garcia St Capitol Site, Cebu City 6000 Philippines

name: GV Tower Hotel
about: GV Hotel is one of the fastest growing budget hotel groups in the Philippines. With 22 branches strategically located all over key places in the country, the GV Hotel Group has also become one of the largest provider of great value accommodations in the Philippine hospitality industry.With its rapid expansion in Visayas, Mindanao and Luzon since starting out in 1999, the GV Hotel Group has become synonymous with quality, service and value for money for the tourist, ahente (sales agent) and negosyante (businessmen/women) market. With no frills practical accommodation, the hotel caters to basic needs whilst ensuring a safe stay during one’s travels.As testimony to the company’s vision and commitment to providing affordable accommodation, GV Tower Hotel was completed in October 2006. The largest branch as of date (June 2013), the GV Tower can accommodate bigger functions and special events; and being one of the tallest buildings in downtown Cebu City, it offers an excellent view of the city and ease of access to the significant tourist spots, such as the Sto Nino Basilica & Magellan’s Cross, as well as access to the Major Markets in Downtown Cebu City.Staying at any GV Hotels is perfect if you’re traveling for business where you will spend most of your time outside on meetings and sales calls. It is also recommended if you’re a tourist who will be outside most of the time appreciating the history, culture, and beauty of the city and province you’re visiting. GV Hotels provides nothing fancy, but it can definitely be the home you can come to at the end of the day to get that good night’s rest.
address: Cor. Osmena Blvd. and Sanciangko St. Cebu, Cebu City 6000 Philippines

name: High Steps Pension
about: SELF-CONTAINED FURNISHED ACCOMMODATION FOR LONG OR SHORT STAY Situated about 50 kilometers north of Cebu City, overlooking clear blue ocean and views of the neighboring islands, we offer quiet comfortable accommodation suitable for visitors who are looking for above average facilities at a budget price. Set in beautiful private gardens of a family home, elevated above and just across the road from the public beach. High Steps Pension is run by a retired Filipino lady assisted by her British partner with each studio room self-contained, affording queen size bed, air-conditioning, en suite bathroom with wc, basin and hot shower. All rooms have their own private entrance with terrace area and parking. A refrigerator, kettle, bottled drinking water, linen and toiletries are also supplied. Most rooms have cooking facilities and there is free wifi available in a public area of the building. Drinks and snacks are available and meals may be taken at Kenneth’s Grill located within the grounds of High Steps Pension or by room service on request. We are located on the main highway, with 24 hour bus services passing by, both to the north and south of the island of Cebu. This makes it an ideal starting place for exploring the many beautiful coastal and provincial places. If you are looking for rest and relaxation in the sun, then you will certainly enjoy the tranquil and friendly atmosphere of this family home. In the interests of the peace and comfort of all our guests we are unable to accommodate young children or pets. Additionally, some of the rooms are not really suitable for disabled. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you to our home for your special holiday in the sun.
address: Central Nautical Highway Bachao, Catmon 6006 Philippines

about: Die Magdalene Apartments sind in der ruhigen und kleinen, exklusiven Außenstelle von Arpili gelagert. Sie liegen auf der Insel Cebu an der Westkueste. Die Kueche ist voll ausgestattet mit Kuehlschrank, Herd, Reiskocher, Mikrowave und Geschirr. Kopfkissen, Leinen und Bettwaesche sind vorhanden. Beim Service kann Waesche abgegeben werden werden. Pro Maschinenladung fuer 200 Pesos (ca. 4 Euro) Die Umgebung besteht aus vielen alten Baeumen und einem herrlichen Ausblick auf die Berge in Cebu Mitte. Der Strand liegt etwa 15 Minuten Fussweg entfernt. Eine West Cebu Business aera (Freihandelspark und Industriezone) ist ebenfalls vorhanden. Eine Fahrtstunde von Arpili entfernt beginnt der Cebu Natural Park mit Wanderoeglichlkeiten und Treckingbegeisterte. Ein atemberaubender Blick wird sie nach erfolgreichem Aufsteig belohnen. Ebenfalls erwhnens wert ist der Transcentral Highway, der quer ber die Insel fuehrt und zahlreiche Attraktionen anbietet. So koennen sie direkt vom Anbauern Gemue

name: Gravino Pension House
about:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly pension (b&b) in Oslob, look no further than Gravino Pension House.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Gravino Pension House offers guests free wifi.
The pension (b&b) features 24 hour front desk, room service, and 24 hour check-in. Plus, Gravino Pension House offers barbeque facilities, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Oslob Italian restaurants such as VLK Pizzeria & Creperie Restaurant, which is a short distance from Gravino Pension House.
If you are interested in exploring Oslob, check out a waterfall, such as Tumalog Falls.
The staff at Gravino Pension House looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.
address: Natalio Bacalso Avenue Calumpang, Oslob 6025 Philippines

name: Bamboo Paradise Beach Resort
about: Bamboo Paradise Beach Resort is an excellent choice for travellers visiting Argao, offering a budget friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.	Rooms at Bamboo Paradise Beach Resort offer air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.	Baggage storage is one of the conveniences offered at this small hotel. If you are driving to Bamboo Paradise Beach Resort, street parking is available.	While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Asian restaurants, including Kafe Marco, 624 Carlock St. Restaurant, and Carenderia ni Eton, all of which are a short distance from Bamboo Paradise Beach Resort.	If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Church of San Miguel Arcangel of Argao (0.7 km), which is a popular attraction amongst tourists, and it is within walking distance.	Enjoy your stay in Argao!
address: 523 Looc Poblacion, Argao 6021 Philippines

about: Native House Resort in Moalboal is located at the southern end of Panagsama Beach. The place reopened in November 2019, after being completely renovated. We offer two types of room: Superior double rooms are equipped with aircondition, television and refrigerator, Standard double rooms have a ceiling fan. Breakfast is included. A big private swimming pool, surrounded with palm trees is the highlight of the resort. The beach is just 50 meters from resort. A variety of water sport activities is at the tip of your fingers – also the coral reef of Pescador island can be reached easily. Canyoning in Kawasan falls and whale shark watching watching in Oslob are among favourite activities in the area. Hiking to the top of Osmena peak, cycling, horseback riding and archery are also among activities that can be found close by. The famous nightlife center of Moalboal is just 10 minute walk from the resort.

name: OYO 457 Dakong Bato Beach And Leisure Resort
about: Located at the southern part of Cebu specifically at the municipality of Dalaguete in Barangay Coro, guests of Dakong Bato Beach and Leisure Resort are assured of no problem finding it as this has been used as a marker to signify entry into the said municipality. "Dakong Bato" translates to Big Rock in the English language. Once you will see the landmark just before you enter the resort's gate, you will instantly understand why such the name... For it literally is what it means. Dakong Bato and Leisure Resort offers fully-air conditioned rooms each with its own private bathroom, equipped with TV and DVD. Rooms can accommodate 2-10 people depending upon its size, whether for couples, families or barkadas. There are specially-designed rooms for workshops and teambuildings as well. Always out to give the best, quality service, this beach and leisure resort comes with free WiFi access to its guests and visitors. Cottages are available for guests who want to spend the day cooling themselves at the beach or taking a dip at its child-friendly spring water pool. The latter, by the way, comes with a slide and a jacuzzi that's perfect for instant relaxation via massage with warm waters. Manicured lawns adorn the whole resort resulting into a lot of nature green color meant to soothe and calm one's soul. For guests on their teambuilding, an array of activities await in line: For the sports buff, the basketball court and water volleyball at the pool are sure to give you good sweating and exercise. For the more adventurous spirit, there are rubber kayaks and dingy boats for rent and a cave adventure adds a cool twist to the otherwise laid-back atmosphere. Apart from this though, what also makes Dakong Bato Beach and Leisure Resort famous is its association to the Visayan folkore which tells the story of "Maria Cacao", the half immortal who made the huge stone the docking place of her golden ship which carried the cacao she sold to Manila and outside countries. Such is the reason why it is said that even if it has been many centuries already, the marker is said to be "immovable" and still literally growing.
address: National Highway Coro, Dalaguete 6022 Philippines

name: Thresher Cove Dive Resort
about: DIVE WITH THRESHER SHARKS, MANTAS, HAMMERHEADS, WHITE TIP SHARKS and MANY MORE at Thresher Cove, a specialist resort for divers. We have a mix of accommodation to suit all budgets, from backpackers to luxury travellers. Set in the diver's mecca of Malapascua Island, Cebu, in the Philippines. With large beautiful grounds, we off the chance to relax and dive in peace away from the noise of the public beach. Our private beach is a 100m strip of white sand that acts as a gateway to your diving adventures. Each day we offer you the chance to dive with thresher sharks. But we also dive with manta, hammer heads and white-tip sharks. For those who love macro life and photography then we will take you diving with pygmy sea horses, frog fish and a host of other amazing sea-life. But of course the main attraction is to dive with thresher sharks. For non-divers, we offer snorkelling, our own beach has wonderful snorkelling, canoeing, swimming in our pool, volleyball, badminton, billiards/pool or just relaxing spa treatments. Our restaurant has rapidly gained a reputation for excellent healthy, fresh foods to suit most budgets and tastes, and includes an extensive vegetarian selection. We even make our own bread, baguettes and croissant. Accommodation is designed to look native on the outside but retains inside, everything you expect from a great resort, air-conditioning, en-suite bathroom, comfortable beds and pillows, satellite TV, free wifi and a refrigerator. We try to make Thresher Cove your home in the Philippines. So if you just want to relax or to dive with thresher sharks and other amazing sea life then please contact us. We off many special packages for instance free accommodation when you learn to dive with us. We hope to see you soon in Thresher Cove Resort & Dive Centre

With so many things to see and do, it is the perfect place to enjoy all Moalboal and Cebu Island has to offer. Our beaches boast the best diving and snorkeling access around. name: Sumisid Lodge
about: Sumisid Lodge is a small and homely diver’s accommodation. The front patio of the lodge connects with the dive center. The venue is the center of Panagsama beach where you will find a variety of restaurants, bars and shops. The front of the lodge faces Negros straight and offers a pretty sun downer. There is a very casual ‘make yourself at home’ kind of feeling to the lodge. Meals are buffet style and if guest join for dinner than all the guest dine at the same time. The cook here has a reputation to excel when it comes to local favorites. Meals are served in the lounge/sitting area and usually guests take their plate and eat on the outside patio. The Dive center is adjacent of the lodge… it doesn’t get easier than this. While you’re having breakfast the dive center staff is preparing your dive gear and you can watch them doing it. A no-nonsense accommodation; this is how it is; this is how we do it and we do it right! If you’re here to dive, then you’ve come to the right place.

Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Cebu R Hotel - Mabolo offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a desk.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage. Guests of Cebu R Hotel - Mabolo are also welcome to enjoy a fitness center and free breakfast, located on site. For travellers arriving by car, free parking is available.
Travellers looking to enjoy some souvlaki can head to Cyma Greek Taverna. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Mediterranean restaurant such as Anzani, La Buona Forchetta Da Paolo, or Beqaa.

name: La Residencia Luzviminda Pensionne
about: La Residencia Luzviminda Pensionne is a small pension house with ten (10) available rooms and range guest capacity of 30 to 40 persons, offering budget friendly standard to deluxe room accommodations located within the heart and vicinity of Cebu City.The actual location of La Residencia Luzviminda Pensionne was formerly a convent of the nuns of the Order of Franciscan Sisters of Baybay, Leyte. The year was 1995, when it was purchased the place was totally overhauled, refurbished, and remodelled but still retaining the original layout of the building and the number of rooms. It was a sound investment at that time and subsequently was also for the purpose of having a vacation home in Cebu for the family and close relatives, while in transit going to our home province in Leyte.Later on, due to the high demand for residential spaces and need for transient accommodations especially during peak seasons and of the Sinulog Festival every January, the seemingly quaint house was converted to a pension house with ten (10) room accommodation having a range guest capacity of 30 to 40 persons. Our place offers budget friendly standard to deluxe room accommodations located within the heart and vicinity of Cebu City. It is a bed and breakfast type of accommodation that have catered to tourists, transients, guests, and also to students.Our usual day can be best described as very quiet but mixed with the bustling sound of jeepneys and vehicles plying through the road. Our perimeter is well adept and curtained around with high walls and a big entrance gate. Thus our place is very much ideal for persons looking for accommodations that provide secluded yet quiet and comfortable space added with very secure and sound neighborhood.Today, in partnership with our sister company -- Luzviminda Travel and Tours, a full service travel agency and consultancy firm that offers complete tour packages in Cebu, Bohol, Cagayan De Oro, Palawan, and Boracay, we stand strong and committed to provide and deliver quality and high standard of hospitality services especially in terms of room accommodations and lodging.So come and stay with us... we are your "home away from home" here in Cebu City.
address: 51 J. Alcantara St., Cebu City 6000 Philippines

Fluently-conversed in English and Korean, the friendly staff can assist with luggage storage, car rentals and concierge services. about:
See why so many travellers make Mango Tree House their guest house of choice when visiting Mandaue. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers an array of amenities designed for travellers like you.
Mango Tree House offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a kitchenette, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.
The guest house offers room service and 24 hour security, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features barbeque facilities. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking.
While visiting Mandaue, you may want to try some dim sum at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Tao Yuan Seafood Restaurant.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Mango Tree House as you experience all of the things Mandaue has to offer.

name: Jo-Cris Apartelle
about:
Jo-Cris Apartelle is an excellent choice for travellers visiting Lapu Lapu, offering a budget friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
While staying at Jo-Cris Apartelle, visitors can check out Virgen dela Regla National Shrine (4.9 km), which is a popular Lapu Lapu attraction.
As your “home away from home,” the small hotel rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to room service while staying at Jo-Cris Apartelle. In addition, Jo-Cris Apartelle offers barbeque facilities, which will help make your Lapu Lapu trip additionally gratifying.
While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the cafes, including Aysken D’ Han, Tarmong, and Bella's Bites Soups and Salads, all of which are a short distance from Jo-Cris Apartelle.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular monuments and statues such as Lapu Lapu Statue and Magellan Shrine.
Enjoy your stay in Lapu Lapu!
